content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: iron_axe
inventory=[{"type": "gray_dye", "quantity": 51, "index": 12}, {"type": "book", "quantity": 42, "index": 15}, {"type": "iron_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "phantom_membrane", "quantity": 22, "index": 18}, {"type": "magenta_carpet", "quantity": 35, "index": 20}, {"type": "nautilus_shell", "quantity": 21, "index": 21}, {"type": "charcoal", "quantity": 39, "index": 22}, {"type": "snowball", "quantity": 2, "index": 24}, {"type": "polished_diorite_slab", "quantity": 39, "index": 26}, {"type": "leather_leggings", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "large_fern", "quantity": 7, "index": 33}, {"type": "iron_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "light_blue_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 43, "index": 38}, {"type": "dead_brain_coral_block", "quantity": 47, "index": 39}, {"type": "gray_wool", "quantity": 35, "index": 41}, {"type": "rabbit_foot", "quantity": 37, "index": 43}, {"type": "dark_oak_slab", "quantity": 5, "index": 44}]

thought: To craft an iron_axe, I need to craft an iron_ingot, spruce_planks, and a stick. To craft an iron_ingot, I need to smelt an iron_block. To smelt an iron_block, I need to place it in the furnace. Therefore, I will move the iron_block from slot 17 to the furnace slot (1).
Ok
act: move from slot 17 to slot 1 with quantity 1
